job_tasks.phrase: Automating Salesforce and CPQ Configurations: Develop AI-driven solutions to streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of AI-driven solutions to automate specific business processes, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: CPQ Optimization: Configure and automate CPQ workflows to improve quoting accuracy and speed
job_tasks.justification: This task involves configuring and automating workflows, which is a software development activity aimed at optimizing business processes.

job_tasks.phrase: CI/CD Pipeline Management: Implement and maintain automated deployment processes for Salesforce updates
job_tasks.justification: Implementing and maintaining automated deployment processes directly relates to CI/CD, which is a core component of MLOps and operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: By leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions, you will ensure all systems are aligned with performance, security, and scalability requirements
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring systems align with performance, security, and scalability requirements is a fundamental aspect of software development and system architecture.

soft_skills.phrase: streamline customizations and minimize manual tasks
leading the delivery of end-to-end business solutions

classification.rationale: The job description heavily focuses on automating Salesforce and CPQ workflows using AI, which is more about business process automation than core AI model development or GenAI specific applications. There's a lack of specific mention of LLMs, generative models, or advanced AI techniques beyond the general term 'AI-driven'.
